name: GH2 Torpedo
additionalNotes:
Gran Habano GH2 Torpedo Natural cigars sport lush Habano wrappers encasing a savory core of diverse longfiller tobaccos. The tapered head offers a more concentrated smoke, pampering your palate with dark creamy, earthy flavors and a spicy finish. As quality & value go, it doesn't get much better than this!

A bundle cigar sold exclusively by Famous Smokeshop.
